name: Kakyuumari / カキュウマリ
description:
Caveman Katamari!

The Moon god has accidentally destroyed the sun! He chooses you as his champion. You must collect enough objects lying around with your flaming log of wood to rebuild the sun.

Credits: 

Lead Programmer - NOKOI  // https://twitter.com/studioNOKOI/

Art, 3D Modeling, Textures - AutistSavant 

Game Music, Cutscene Music and Sound Design- Greenjah // https://kbmusicandsfx.itch.io/

Sound Design and Audio Implementation - Thrilmur // https://thrilmur.itch.io/
